TopicTitle: The KSP Community My Little Pony Megathread

Articles.Content:
Because /mlp/, just like the /b/, is quite NSFW.

but /mlp/ is moderated to be sfw (much to the dismay of nor/mlp/eople, I might add).

I made a pony flag. And yes, I did do a special MÃƒÂ¼n mission just to test it out.

Here's the flag itself in case anyone wants to use it.

The center element was ripped from here, the other stuff was shamelessly stolen from the NASA logo.

Edited May 27, 2013 by KevinW42

I'm also using a few MLP flags, though it's not obvious to those who aren't familiar with it.

For irony's sake, I tested the flag planting not by putting the NLR one on the Mun, but the Solar Empire one.
Have a flag!

I have a few pony flags, and I'm working a converting* a few more.

*I say converting because I don't actually make any of the flags, just shrink them down to the right size.

Huh. Looking at it now, I have mostly Luna flags. I'll need to find some Celestia ones to balance it out.
Your icons cute Stormman3100 ^u^ PONIES!!!!

I honestly don't understand why there needs to be a mlp thread here. I, for one, am content with /mlp/. Why do we need pone here?

Because MLP does not simply stay i one place ,but spreads like the cat memes of today.
I have a sudden feeling that not that many bronies are active these days....I feel so lonely.

I have a sudden feeling that not that many bronies are active these days....I feel so lonely.

I know the feeling.

Unrelated to the lonely passage through space, I'm planning on posting some more flags soon. Just want to get a few more done before I do.
okay ,we need more pony related flags for almost any mission one can think of.

Lunar United National Aerospace :3

After the tenuous efforts and sacrifices of the denizens of Kerbin, a new territory is acquired for the empire. LUNA 1 landing successful. Still surprised I didn't break the engine off.

Flag

Flag sans SSTO Papillion

Faust?

Edited June 5, 2013 by Ikkaku
Added another version of the flag..
*claps* what do you use to hold that lander.Also nice flag there.

Is that a Mapsat dish?

Edit that blue shape looks like a gentlemans area
That is the dish from remote tech

@DarthVadar:

Hmm. I see what you mean. It is the silhouette of Glacierre's small SSTO ship which I found in a posting below. Rescaling from the original image didn't do it justice. Ideally I wanted a silhouette of a ship orbiting the moon. Easy enough to remove/replace since it's in a layer on my PAINT.NET file.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24987-I-finally-pulled-off-and-SSTO!?highlight=Papillon]).

@MGUARN:

It's precariously balancing on the engine exhaust. I miscalculated the distance the lander legs extend out, so they're all just hanging uselessly in the "air"/vacuum. It wasn't one of my "test first on land then apply to Mun landing" type of landers. More of a "I think I'll try to land on the Mun today" landers. I should have enough delta-V to get back to the orbiting command pod, I think. Spent more than I wanted to in that landing.

Yes, that's a RemoteTech dish. Adds a nice bit of realism to unmanned flights, now that I have a basic network orbiting Kerbin and relay stations at the poles. I'll set up a relay on or orbiting the Mun next, I think, so I can send a MapSat probe to Minimus, survey, then look at some unmanned/manned landings. (Probably cheaper to set up a long range dish relay in orbit, though, but, eh.)

If only i can use that mod...

Anyway,who is best pony?

Everyone is best pony.

I think that there is no "best" pony, they complementary to each other.

Anyway, I believe that point of this series is promoting diversity and show children that "buddy up" with people showing different (than You) personalties and interests is a good idea.
